about_the_game:
Uncensored version of Nejicomi Simulator Vol4. You will be enjoy the game fully 18+

By purchasing this DLC, the following features will be added
1. the ability to set the mosaic type to uncorrected when changing settings
2. adding a setting to fully open all settings
3. adding a setting to hide the watermark when making videos

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content. The sexual content in this game includes SM-like sexual content, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, limbless women, excessive piercings, obscene body paint, etc. All characters are over 18 years old.
